page.title: 03ATTITUDES TO SCHOOL
page.content: School takes up a good deal of an individuals life, at least twelve years (which isn't exactly fun.) I just about survived the last seven years of it. I thoroughly understand why many people dislike school. Getting up early and listening to teachers for five hours is not at all enjoyable. People who enjoy that sort of thing are commonly known as ("swots!") Some teachers see school as a place to make progress. I see it as a place you go to where you absorb as much information as possible until you get to the point where you explode. But that's just my opinion, shared by the rest of the first year puipls. By Dioma Ukoumunme (Latymer School)
